header.title: Sibling Santa Snap Shots
header.body: Every year my sisters and I take a photo with Santa. Here they are collected.

photos.body: We decided to do a themed photo for the first time. Our original idea was Santa's Secret Service but everyone kept saying Men in Black so we went with it.
We didn't know our grandmother was even in the country at the time so when we bumped into her at the mall we said, you're taking a photo with us.

We decided to do a themed photo for the first time. Our original idea was Santa's Secret Service but everyone kept saying Men in Black so we went with itMinions! We borrowed a bunch of minion toys from our friends and that's a Fruit Ninja banana.
Animal Onesies! This year we were a little pressed for time but we were okay with how it turned out. This is also the first year we decided to get digital versions of the photos.
Alvin and the Chipmunks. My sister came up with the idea because we used to listen to the Christmas album every year. Pretty happy with how this one turned out. :)

Princess Leia, Rey, Luke. Once again, my sister came up with the idea. Can't say no the Star Wars though. Since one sister was old movie Leia, and the other sister was new movie Rey, I decided to be a generic X-wing Pilot so that I can say I'm Luke or Po from old or new trilogy.

We also had my twin brother join us this year. In this shot, Leia is holding the blaster backwards. Whoops!

If you look closely, you'll also see BB-8 in Santa's hand. He was very excited about the movies, he said. And wished us goodbye with "May the Force be with you."
From left to right we have: Tooth Fairy, Santa Claus, Easter Bunny, and Cupid.
Arthur, D.W., Kate, and Pal visit Santa!

From left to right:
- Benji as Mario
- Keane as Luigi
- Reah as Ness
- Angel as Pikachu
- Santa holding Sonic
- Hannah as Link
- Wayne as Little Mac

This one has Santa in it. Yet... somehow feels like not enough Santa...

From left to right:
- Santa
- Santa
- Santa
- Santa

2019b - Santa Convention

Ah now THAT is a Santa Claus photo

2020 - Santa Photo Number 10. Social Distancing Edition

Special guests: All of the above

2021 - Santa Photo Number 11. Frozen Face Edition

We had to wear masks this year so we incorporated it into our outfits.
2022 - Santa Photo Number 12. We finally have enough progeny to recreate the grandmother photo from the original year.

1998 - Santa Photo Number -1

I'm just a kid, and life is a nightmare.

2023 - Santa Photo Number 13

I'm just a kid, I know that it's not fair.
